categories: Category:Star Wars: Episode IX The Rise of Skywalker actors

nodes.text: Cyril Ikechukwu Nri (born April 25, 1961) is a Nigerian British actor, writer and director who portrays a First Order officer in the 2019 film Star Wars: Episode IX The Rise of Skywalker. He is best known for playing Superintendent Adam Okaro in the police TV series The Bill.
